column1: To answer in pounds, press 1. To answer in kilograms, press 2. Then press [ENTER] to continue.

column2: Len : 2    PREFERRED WAY TO REPORT WEIGHT
OTE: WTPOUND2 was recoded to pounds from reports of weights in kilograms. For respondents who chose to report their weight in kilograms, a
conversion factor was applied of 2.20462 pounds to 1 kilogram to produce a weight in pounds. Females aged 12 to 44 who were currently pregnant
were asked to report their weight before they got pregnant. WTPOUND2 was then rounded to the nearest integer and top coded at 295 pounds and

column2: About how much did you weigh before you got pregnant? Please type in the number of pounds and then press [ENTER].
